text:
="preserve">Don Kidd (October 10, 1937 – August 27, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the New Mexico State Senate from 1993 to 2005. He was born in Crowell, Texas.
Kidd died on August 27, 2020 at his home in Carlsbad, New Mexico from pancreatic cancer at the age of 82.
